references.paper_title: RelPose++: Recovering 6D poses from sparse-view observations
references.reason: RelPose++ serves as one of the essential baselines for pose estimation, which SparseAGS builds upon and improves through iterative refinement and outlier removal.

references.paper_title: Cameras as rays: Sparse-view pose estimation via ray diffusion
references.reason: This paper proposes a novel ray diffusion-based approach for sparse-view pose estimation, offering an alternative baseline that SparseAGS refines, demonstrating the method's versatility.

references.paper_title: Sparf: Neural radiance fields from sparse and noisy poses
references.reason: SPARF is a key competitor method in sparse-view 3D reconstruction, providing a strong baseline against which SparseAGS's performance is measured and improved upon.
